text: (Mominaharu!) Manisaharuka lagi paida gari'eko sabai sampradayaharumadhye timiharu sabaibhanda uttama hau kinaki satkarma garna bhandachau ra duskarmabata tadha rahana sika'umdachau ra allahamathi astha rakhdachau ra yadi ahale kitabale pani astha rakheko bha'e tiniharuko nimti dherai ramro hune thiyo. Tiniharumadhye imanavalaharu pani chan ra dherai jaso avajnakariharu chan
